name: Ntec
tagline: open-source information visualization and analysis tool
body:
ntec ==== is an open-source information visualization and analysis tool that is available under the MIT license. Users features:
  • tables
  • charts
  • monitorization objects
  • filters
  • free draw objects
  • sql analysis tool
Admin features:
  • backoffice menus
  • frontoffice config
  • options template config
  • page config
  • templates config
    • CSS
    • charts
    • monitorization objects
  • users config
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
